Detailed Description

Print accuracy information after each epoch and after testing.

Definition at line 39 of file lbann_callback_print.hpp.

00052                                                 {
00053   lbann_comm* comm = m->get_comm();
00054   if (comm->am_model_master()) {
00055     DataType train_acc = m->get_train_accuracy();
00056     DataType validate_acc = m->get_validate_accuracy();
00057     if (comm->am_world_master()) {
00058       std::vector<DataType> train_accs(comm->get_num_models());
00059       std::vector<DataType> validate_accs(comm->get_num_models());
00060       comm->intermodel_gather(train_acc, train_accs);
00061       comm->intermodel_gather(validate_acc, validate_accs);
00062       for (size_t i = 0; i < train_accs.size(); ++i) {
00063         std::cout << "Model " << i;
00064         std::cout << " @" << m->get_cur_step() << " steps";
00065         std::cout << " Training accuracy: " << train_accs[i] << "%";
00066         std::cout << " Validation accuracy: " << validate_accs[i] << "%";
00067         std::cout << std::endl;
00068       }
00069     } else {
00070       comm->intermodel_gather(train_acc, comm->get_intermodel_master());
00071       comm->intermodel_gather(validate_acc, comm->get_intermodel_master());
00072     }

00074       layer->epoch_print();
00075     }
